website_summaries.verdict: The best-known brand in ear plugs, these basic ones help you sleep soundly and don't cost much.
pros: Their moldable silicone putty fits very comfortably in the ear and block out most minor noises around you
cons: They don't work as well as some users would like

customer_reviews.title: Macks clear ones are better than these
customer_reviews.text: These make my inner ear sweat more than the clear ones which makes them no longer stay in the ear. The gois thong abut these is they don't stick to my hair. Overall I prefer the clear ones.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good seal, good noise blocking.
customer_reviews.text: These seal easily in my ears. They definitely shut out the exterior noise, but the noise of my own breathing, swallowing etc. is magnified. Silicone ear plugs in general make me slightly uneasy because they seal air-tight. This is good for the noise blocking, but I can feel my eardrum moving around when I seal/unseal them. Worried a bit about long term damage if I were to wear them every night.
customer_reviews.author: shris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough to sleep in and they work!
customer_reviews.text: I had to train myself to use ear plugs, but once I did I LOVE them! I could have never done it with any other kind! These are the best, I have been using these for about three years now and have never had any problems. They drown out the noise and are very comfortable, like I am not wearing anything in my ears. They are the only way I get any sleep some nights.
customer_reviews.author: Leland & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Snoozers Helped Me Snooze!
customer_reviews.text: My spouse likes to watch TV in the bedroom at night and I'm someone who needs dark and quiet. I tried other earplugs but found them too uncomfortable for side sleeping. They caused too much pressure on my ear or they fell out. When I tried Max Snoozers, I found them to be comfortable for sleeping, they don't fall out, the price is great and I can still hear my alarm but enough of the TV noise is blocked so that I can fall asleep and stay asleep. They also work great for snoring noises and dog noises.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Moleski

customer_reviews.title: I’ve got small ear canals. For an adult. And finally found something that works.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got small ear canals. For an adult. And finally found something that works. Wow I’ve been buying so many products for kids I have small ear canals. This is the one product this exact product ive used their orange ones for kids. But these are way more easy to use and cancel out and are soft but stay in. I really hope they never stop making these. I use it for sleep. Wow it’s the one ear plug that fits it’s easy to smush up and fits. I barely use half of one. And it cancels the noise out better than anything else even their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Laceykthoughts

customer_reviews.title: Best protection in this type of ear pro
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and did not insert into my ear canal, and it blocked out the majority of noise, if not entire sound when at lower decibles. I attend pro hockey games with a stupidly loud speaker, which ruins my fun These return me to that fun by protecting my hearing. Definite repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a good product for some people. These were very uncomfortable to wear. They also hurt. Tried them several occasions and made sure I followed the directions. My friend tried the ones I had left and felt the same way. So I’m my opinion my they were to large to fit in my outer ear area.
customer_reviews.author: h rose

customer_reviews.title: very good.  1 earplug works for both my ears
customer_reviews.text: I found that by splitting 1 it was more effective. they sit in the ear better. I use them for a neighbor who plays music all night, the bass is killer. this combined with brown noise= amazing sleep. Even without the music it will clearly stop any abrupt noise that will wake you. Maybe a 1-2 days to adjust to wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Big Owl

customer_reviews.title: Best sound blocking, least painful
customer_reviews.text: Sent these to a friend. I've only used the clear ones from same brand but she says they work fine. The trick is to make a good seal with them on the outer part of your ear. They work great once you get the hang of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you have bought it before.
customer_reviews.text: I does not do the job to keep out noise. I still could here my neighbor walking above my apartment and when he flushes the toilet it can still be heard. You will not get your money back from what I know, so do what you like if you get this item,your at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: A yucky mess
customer_reviews.text: These sort of kept the noise out but they were a gummy sticky mess. Hair gets stuck on them, feels like gum in your ears and are not reusable. Going back to the foam ear plugs
customer_reviews.author: Kimbee Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh... Do Not Reccmommend!
customer_reviews.text: Get this instead:  .... these things are very expensive, due to the fact that you cannot resuse them! Very uncomfortable..... BUY THIS INSTEAD:  I sleep soooooo much better using this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Kaizen Kings

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, best for me
customer_reviews.text: I guess earplugs are very personal. I hate wearing them but sometimes I need them for sleep. I've tried tons of brands and styles, and this is my favorite. The cone shaped foam ones never fit my ears. I actually like these better than the clear Macs, but they are both ok.
customer_reviews.author: Florian

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really like these, prefer the original kind to block out ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like these, prefer the original kind to block out snoring. Felt they fell out of my ears and didn't really block the sound that great.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Bought for use on motorcycle and love
customer_reviews.text: Was on the fence about these due to the mixed reviews, but took a chance for the price. I'm rather pleased, they block alot of sound(almost too much) and are comfortable and stay in place. They do take a bit of finesse to apply, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cancels the noise, but gets linty and is a little slippery
customer_reviews.text: I like these for the most part. I use them at night because my boyfriend snores. They work, but they fall out of my ears fairly easily and they get slippery from the moisture in your ears. Also, you can’t really reuse them as often as they say. They are good for the noise, though!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only way I got any sleep with a snoring ex boyfriend that swore he didn't snore. eyeroll.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Blocks my husband's CPAP noise, but lets me hear my meditations with the earphones. For me stickiness last 3 nights. With both ears, product adds up; glad its affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M M

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre At Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to block out loud snoring. It worked semi well, but for the amount of effort it took to correctly pop these in, I was expecting complete sound blocking. I could still hear the snoring through these ear putty plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Not as convenient as regular ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: Found the putty hard to work and it didn't hold well.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Dandenell

customer_reviews.title: Not for long hair
customer_reviews.text: They work good for cancelling noise but only use them if you have short hair. My hair got stuck in them.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Not so much....
customer_reviews.text: I used them for sleeping and they often fell out or didn’t block the noise enough to make them worth wearing.
customer_reviews.author: LadyAmazonP

customer_reviews.title: Better than foam
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps out the noise , comforatable snd don’t go down ear canal better than foam
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time fitting these in my ears so it’s quiet enough. The directions are not very well either.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Not the answer for our problem.
customer_reviews.text: My son needed earplugs to get a good night's rest after it was necessary for another family member to share the room. These plugs wouldn't stay put. We kept finding them in his bedding the next morning. We changed to foam plugs, and we occasionally lose one, but at least he's getting more rest.
customer_reviews.author: howlingwolf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable effective snoring blocker
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how much I like these for blocking my boyfriends snoring. I needed an alternative to foam, since my ears were having a bad itchy reaction. These are comfortable all night long and they block the sound. As a small person with small ears I can split them in half.
customer_reviews.author: Devi Daly Yoga

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly and didn't come out until I took them out. They were also very comfortable. I was sleeping right next to a very loud snoring person and never heard a sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sound blockers
customer_reviews.text: They don't perfectly block all sound, I don't think any sleep aid could do that but they block enough noise like snoring and ticking clocks to allow a better night's sleep. Malleable and will adjust to any ear opening.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anne Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband works the night shift, so he sleeps all day. I have 3 wild little boys who don’t know the meaning of “quite” my husband sleeps through their screaming, he sleeps through me vacuuming in the room he’s sleeping in, he probably would sleep through a nuclear bomb going off with these things in. They work WONDERS!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: This also gives you a great amount of noise reduction and peace of mind while ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with stabilizing pressure during landing on flights. This also gives you a great amount of noise reduction and peace of mind while flying.
customer_reviews.author: allison clark

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Not that great! Try Worlds finest earplugs they are much better than these
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Twp, MI

customer_reviews.title: He love the feel and I blocked out most the sound but
customer_reviews.text: Worked well I got them for my husband he says He love the feel and I blocked out most the sound but he prefers the other earplugs not because of them being comfortable But because they block out more sound
customer_reviews.author: Caenyn

customer_reviews.title: What did you say?
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is enjoying the plugs. There for her hearing health.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Topp

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Blocked the sound well...but...tangled with hair. Might be great with someone with very short hair.
customer_reviews.author: The Rev

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best for noise canceling, forget foam products.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to cancel noise while sleeping? This is the product to use. Do bother with foam plugs, they are useless. Get this putty plugs, far superior! I use them for swimming as well.
customer_reviews.author: GCHall

customer_reviews.title: THESE DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: These do not cancel noise hardly at all. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Tholl

customer_reviews.title: They cancel out snoring!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for blocking out noise including snoring. I am a very light sleeper even the vibration of my husband's snoring will keep me awake. the only down side is if my ear get moist with sweat or maybe it's ear fluid the seal releases.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dobrzynski

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have to sleep with ear plugs in order to stay asleep, and these don't irritate my ear canals
customer_reviews.author: Person Buying Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these to keep the wind out of his ears. They block wind but not the sound. So he is happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Angee Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when sleeping with somebody who snores!
customer_reviews.text: These are like little balls of silly putty. They are easy to shape so you get complete protection from all noise.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Not for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. Hurts my ears to put in. Hair gets stuck in them. Fall out while I'm sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping and swimming
customer_reviews.text: I got these to help sleep at night as I’m a light sleeper. They’re easy to use and mold In to your ear perfectly. I use them for swimming also and they’re great for keeping water out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I'm just not using these right or what but they don't block sound at all. I only experience a little noise reduction when I push them deep into my ear - which the directions say not to do... they also are rather painful for me due to my small ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earplugs for cancelling noise while trying to sleep. They are easy to use as well!
customer_reviews.author: debbie wendt

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect for me because it really does what they say ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes my husband snores loud enough to wake the neighbors! This product is perfect for me because it really does what they say it will do. Will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get a seal
customer_reviews.text: I did find them difficult to us....It was difficult to get the seal. You have to really press ....hard...then there's no guarantee they won't "pop"
customer_reviews.author: MaryE

customer_reviews.title: They don't keep out all of the sound. My ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't keep out all of the sound. My boyfriend is a heavy snorer and I can still here him through these ear plugs. Also, if you don't get them in your ear just right they hurt a bit when you lay down to go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Enders

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Effectively block unwanted noise and mold comfortably in ear canal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me
customer_reviews.text: Just don't work for me. Not sure if too big or can't expand in my ear correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work Great!! they mold easily to the ear. These are good if your ear canal is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Blocking Out Surrounding Sounds
customer_reviews.text: I used it to block out surrounding sounds, like snoring, that prevent me from falling asleep.
customer_reviews.author: pat lasan

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best game changer ever!! Best decision for me to get the sleep I need!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa shaver

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They lose their stickiness quickly, but do work when fresh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product that REALLY KEEPS OUT NOISE
customer_reviews.text: Uninterrupted sleep now! Wonderful product that REALLY KEEPS OUT NOISE!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Berman

customer_reviews.title: Great for blocking sound while I sleep
customer_reviews.text: I sleep in these every night. They're comfortable and block out just enough sound to help me sleep, but not so much that I'm afraid I won't hear my kids if they need me during the night.
customer_reviews.author: H. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Sound free sleep
customer_reviews.text: Like the light I also need to keep out the outdoor sounds out while I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem to work just like the clear ones, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Take them everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for sleeping with a snoring bear beside you or enjoying the basketball game without the headache afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Not good... feels like squishing bubble gum in your ear. Just not for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: These work, but I prefer the clear ones because they stay in better and stay sticky longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great....and they don't stick to your hair like the regular silicone ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Caryl Daly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear earplugs
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs are quite comfortable, but they don't block out all the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice D.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Silicon putty earplugs are so much more effective than anything else I've tried. I really like it. Mack's are good, I've been using them for years. They don't dry out fast, keep their stickiness for a long time and block noise excellently. The only downside for me is the size, they are too big for me and by no means do I have small ears. I usually trim about 20% off to give me a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use while camping at a 3-day music festival. I, unlike everyone else in the tent, slept like a rock! 7,000 campers, music shows that ran until 4 a.m., a baby in a tent two feet from us, and my friend who snores like a bear -- I never heard a peep! I highly recommend these ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Mandaray

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These work the best I recommend that people buy these if you are looking to block out snoring and noise.
customer_reviews.author: lisa young

customer_reviews.title: Macks Snoozers Silicone Putty Earplugs, 6-Count
customer_reviews.text: This version of the product with the pinkish color is best. I have used these for years. Great in keeping extraneous noise from the mind. Highly recommend this type of Macks Silicon Earplugs; Dr Z
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Zarlengo

customer_reviews.title: No help at all
customer_reviews.text: They didn't help at all!!! I share a room with a woman who snoze so loud that the nurse can hear from outside the door. This the third product I have tried. I did have one that worked real well but I lost them. Thanks for asking. whitcomb862@ gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Susan B Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: They just don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions. Can still hear everything. Also, the suction feels extremely uncomfortable, and these things will stick to your hair at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H

customer_reviews.title: Did not help at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not help at all + my hair got stuck to them...
customer_reviews.author: Lior Boogtus

customer_reviews.title: These things aren't as good as the clear soft silicon pack
customer_reviews.text: These things aren't as good as the clear soft silicon pack. They don't stick to your ear as well as the clear silicon earplugs. They fall out at times because of the lack of stick and they are only good for one use unlike the clear ones. I'll easily get about two or more uses out of the clear brand. Idk how that is same brand but if your looking for good earplugs go with Macks soft silicone instead of these.
customer_reviews.author: Moses B. Roman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: awful. fell out of my ears and didn't block sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C

customer_reviews.title: I hate these things
customer_reviews.text: I hate these things. It feels like a ball of snot in your ear. I can hear everything. Didn't stop any noise
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leckel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked good for keeping the noise out but they made my ears sweat.
customer_reviews.author: JTT

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable when I use
customer_reviews.text: Does not block the noise at all... not comfortable when I use.....
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Dumb and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as I have a snoring problem. However, they don't work and they feel awful in your ear. He wasn't able to sleep with them on at all.
customer_reviews.author: C Raff

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! Didn’t even muffle snoring. Back to sleeping on couch!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Didn’t even muffle snoring. Back to sleeping on couch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks compared to hearos soft ear plugs.
customer_reviews.text: Soft yes. Did nothing to reduce the noise of my grandmas snoring!! Her talking too was still very clear. I'm throwing package away since it's hassle try to return something that I bought for $4. Waste of money. Hearos soft ear plugs works better at reducing snoring yet hurts my ear not as moldable.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great ear protection
customer_reviews.text: Mack's always comes through. These putty ear protection work great - I use them when riding my motorcycle, at the shooting range, when sleeping & I don't want to hear the 5 am garbage pick up. They seal out noise & form nicely to the ears. I ignore the instruction to never stuff them into the ear - I cut these in half then use a half for each ear, molding a little horn & insert into the ear as far as possible. A huge amount of noise is cut & have been using these like this for many years with no ill effects. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: james coyne

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the "Snoozers" ... Get the regular Mack's silicone earplugs instead.
customer_reviews.text: These function exactly as expected, EXCEPT they do not last as long as Mack's other "white/clear" silicone earplugs. The putty color is interesting, but I think whatever additive they use to make the color causes them to deteriorate faster than the 100% silicone variety. If you're looking for silicone earplugs that will last for more than 3 nights, skip this one and find the Mack's regular silicone earplugs instead. The color is just a gimmick that fails.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST earplugs I have ever tried! The directions say not to break them in half but I did anyway because the pieces were large. I was waking up every day at 4am to loud annoying birds chirping and it was driving me insane. With these in i slept through the night! They are super comfortable and didnt move until I physically pulled them out the next day. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bardalez

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: These might be the right earplug for someone, but I found them uncomfortable. Also they trapped air in my ear and felt more like a suction cup. I would liken them to silly putty. I was afraid my hair would get stuck in them. I was disappointed in this product. Again it might work for someone else, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Beci

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs ever for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Not as sticky (with suction) as the clear ones or the red kids ones. Still stay in all night and block sound just as well. No ear infections either, and they seem to last a bit longer with reuse. I don't know what they changed to make them less prone to causing ear infection, but it works. Thank you Macs!
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Ear Plugs Putty-Like Device
customer_reviews.text: I like this product however I have learned to drop each ball into 190 degree water and insert within 60 seconds--having two pair un-used; the first two pair did not stick well. I will keep TRYING. I live near the equator and maybe a REVIEW of the ingredients is needed (ie, balance between silicone and "Silly Putty").
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: I really like these
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs are the best I've ever tried. I've used Mack's earplugs since the 70s because my spouse snores. They work great for that. Before these came out, I always used the white silicone type, which were good. Now since I've tried the Snoozers, these are the best!
customer_reviews.author: A. Learner

customer_reviews.title: Can't return, great if you like to hear your own heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: So, wanted to give these a shot, turns out that it does block out *outside* noise, but amplifies internal noises. So, your heartbeat, for example, now you can hear pulsating in your ears. It's weird and not really much better then the outside noises I was trying to block. Oh and by the way, cannot return due to policies...
customer_reviews.author: I.V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't stay in ears so no sound is blocked
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like thr original ones. Not sticky at all so when you warm them up with your hands snd put them in your ears they just fall out. I have tiny ears so I break them in half but not impressed with these at all
customer_reviews.author: runnergirl35

customer_reviews.title: The Snore Silencer
customer_reviews.text: These work! I slept through the night uninterrupted by my partners snoring. The silicone plugs are large, but more comfortable than expanding foam. They cover the ear canal rather than going into it. My only minor issue is that little strands of my hair got into the putty. But easily removed. These will make my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: MOM2-3

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to the fact that my upstairs neighbours are noisy. Ease to use and block the sounds. I bought it because i do not like products that are inserted in the ear canal. A minor con is that some pillow's fibers stick to it. I definitely will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Okida

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: These really did not work for me, they are super big, so you could actually tear one ear plug in half, suction is not great either, so I could still hear noise through them, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Best product I've purchased to increase the quality of my life. Just roll into a little ball and seal onto the ear. Does not enter the ear canal and thus is not painful to sleep on. Its a bit like silly putty and a lot like roosters and barking dogs muted, FINALLY!
customer_reviews.author: Puwdy pad

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are more comfortable than the disposable foam ones I’ve been using. They help me sleep better, block out snoring and don’t interfere when I lay on my side. They can be sticky and my hair long hair gets stuck to them a bit which is the only downside to these.
customer_reviews.author: GeeWizTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work good.
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I gave them 4 stars because they are a little awkward to get formed to your ear. That said, once formed, they do their job. Not suitable for extreme high noise areas, but for most uses, just fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stalker

customer_reviews.title: Larger than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected and appear to be rather sticky. Decided to send them back since I had not opened either package only to find they were not returnable. I wasn't very happy about that. Ended up throwing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O

customer_reviews.title: The Couch for Me.
customer_reviews.text: They do not seal in my ears very well. I have small ears but they will not stay. I tried only using half of each piece thinking they were too big. Did not work for me. The couch is my new sleeping place I guess. My husbands snoring is getting louder.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Putty bad!
customer_reviews.text: It’s one of the most uncomfortable things I’ve ever put in my ears
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: These are too big for my ears, I had to split on in half and it doesn't drown out my husband's loud snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Rillo

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear anything
customer_reviews.text: My husband snores and was keeping me awake all night! NOT ANYMORE! With these MACK'S SNOOZERS I can sleep soundly and can't hear him at all! They are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Janie C

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I worked in a very loud warehouse and did not like the foam ones work provided. These work great! You can reuse them a few times if you replace them in the case at the end of the day and keep them clean. I never buy any earplugs except Macks!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I've tried 'em all!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands-down the most comfortable earplug for wearing while sleeping, and that's a good thing because they also block the most noise!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Y. Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I do these will not stay on. Not even for a second. So frustrating 😭
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

product_meta.title: Mack's Snoozers Silicone Putty Earplugs - 6 Pair – Comfortable, Moldable Silicone Ear Plugs for Sleeping, Snoring, Loud Noise & Traveling
product_meta.description: Molds very comfortably to the unique contours of any ear; Doctor's choice for sealing out water (helps prevent swimmer's ear) & reducing noise with a noise reduction rating (NRR) 22 decibels.; For swimming, sleeping, studying, bathing, work, travel, loud events, flying discomfort, etc (6 Pair); Plastic carrying case included. (6 pair); USA's #1 selling and doctor recommended ear care brand
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL – USA’s original and exclusive formula silicone ear plugs. Provides safe, non-toxic, non-allergenic waterproof protection and protects hearing from loud noises.

THE ULTIMATE IN EARPLUG COMFORT - Mack’s soft moldable silicone putty molds very comfortably to the unique contours of any ear. The no pressure, cover-only design provides unsurpassed comfort for quality, restful sleep and insomnia relief.
#1 BRAND FOR SNORING - Mack’s is the #1 Doctor Recommended Brand to get a good night’s sleep when sleeping with a snoring spouse. Mack’s Earplugs have been saving marriages since 1962.

#1 BRAND USED BY DOCTORS - Mack’s is the #1 brand of moldable silicone earplugs personally used by doctors. Mack’s soft silicone putty provides a better, more comfortable fit and seal than custom molded ear plugs. These ear plugs are MADE IN THE USA and carry a Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 22 decibels.

MULTI-USE - These super versatile earplugs are great for a multitude of uses, including sleeping, snoring, swimming, studying, bathing, travel, loud events, concerts, flying discomfort, motorcycles, etc. Mack’s moldable silicone earplugs are even lab tested and proven to help relieve airplane ear pressure and pain due to flying. Includes storage case.
